name: AnimationDefinition
desc: The configuration, including target object, timeframe, and visual semantics, of an animation.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: A textual name for the animation.

items.name: var bindTarget: BindTarget
items.desc: A textual name that identifies the particular property that animates.

items.name: var blendLayer: Int32
items.desc: The order in which the framework composites the animation.

items.name: var speed: Float
items.desc: A factor that increases or decreases the animation’s rate of playback.

items.name: var delay: TimeInterval
items.desc: An amount of time that lapses before the animation plays.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The total playback time of the animation.

items.name: var offset: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time, in seconds, at which the animation begins within the duration.

items.name: var trimDuration: TimeInterval?
items.desc: An optional duration that overrides the source animation’s duration.

items.name: var trimStart: TimeInterval?
items.desc: The time, in seconds, at which the animation plays.

items.name: var trimEnd: TimeInterval?
items.desc: The time, in seconds, at which the source animation stops.

items.name: func trimmed(start: TimeInterval?, end: TimeInterval?, duration: TimeInterval?) -> Self
items.desc: Edits the animation duration according to the specified time.

items.name: var repeatMode: AnimationRepeatMode
items.desc: An option that determines how the animation repeats.

items.name: var fillMode: AnimationFillMode
items.desc: An option that determines which data displays outside of the normal duration.

items.name: func repeated(count: TimeInterval) -> Self
items.desc: Repeats an animation the number of times specified by a decimal number.

items.name: func repeated(count: Int) -> Self
items.desc: Repeats an animation the number of times specified by a whole number.

items.name: func repeatingForever() -> Self
items.desc: Repeats an animation an indefinite number of times.
